name: About Us Templates
description: Collection of 3 distinct About Us page designs, each with unique personality and storytelling approach

templates.name: Corporate Storytelling Excellence
templates.description: Professional and sophisticated design with interactive timeline, leadership profiles, and animated statistics
templates.preview: Blue gradient hero, interactive timeline, leadership team cards, animated counters, and client testimonials

templates.name: Immersive Technology Experience
templates.description: Cutting-edge design with animated particles, interactive process visualization, and technology showcase
templates.preview: Dark theme with animated particles, interactive process steps, team hover effects, and global presence map

templates.name: Human-Centered Warmth
templates.description: Warm and personal approach with founder story, day-in-life scenes, and community impact highlights
templates.preview: Warm yellow tones, personal founder story, team personality cards, and community project showcase
